thread.title: Elizabeth Fingleton
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Elizabeth Fingleton

author: Elizabeth Fingleton
title: Elizabeth Fingleton
text: I had these runners in a different colour last year and I loved them so much I bought them in brown this year. They're so comfy and really help my flat feet. They last really well and can be cleaned easily. I'm a big fan of Ecco and I recommend them to anyone looking for a quality shoe.
